txt.en: Report to Lúmar in Ost Arndír

'You return! With the scent of black powder about you, but looking none the worse for wear. Did you find Igerna?'

You hand him the report and explain what you found. He takes it from you and reads it gravely.

'It seems we owe you great thanks for your actions in Krauzhaf and across Pinnath Gelin. I shall send knights to deal with the remaining goblins, and a horse for Igerna, that she might not have to walk all the way back.

'Thank you, [placeholder]. You are true to your reputation, and lucky we are that you arrived when you did.'
'Word of the goblins must be brought to Ost Arndir, but my wound will make my journey a slow one.
Igerna has sent you on to Ost Arndír with her report of the goblin incursion.\n\nYou should bring the report to Lúmar and let him know what you and Igerna have been doing.
'You return! With the scent of black powder about you, but looking none the worse for wear. Did you find Igerna?'

'Word of the goblins must be brought to Ost Arndír, but my wound will make my journey a slow one. I beg of you one last boon – bring this report to Lúmar. He needs to know about the threat of the goblins. The knights will take it from here, [placeholder].'
Word of the Ronkrúm goblin incursion must be brought to Ost Arndír.
